what_did:
King Chulalongkorn helped modernize Thailand.
He ended slavery, improved schools and hospitals, and built railways.
He worked hard to keep Thailand free from being taken over by other countries.
why_matters:
King Rama V made big changes to help his people live better lives.
He is remembered as a wise and kind king who brought progress to Thailand.
